N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 9 ยง 1932.2 - Disbursements

State Regulations
(a) The corporation
shall make payments for eligible acquisition, reconstruction, or rehabilitation
costs on a project basis, conditioned upon the compliance with policies and
procedures of the corporation and submission of satisfactory information by the
eligible applicant. Where an eligible applicant has transferred ownership of a
project and assigned the regulatory agreement with approval of the corporation, disbursements may be made directly to the assignee. (b) The corporation may provide for the
deposit of any payment or grant directly with a lending institution pursuant to
an escrow agreement satisfactory to the corporation. The corporation shall take
into consideration such factors as compliance with its investment policy and
the needs of the project. Notes
